footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Yaoyao | Update Date: 01/23/2023 | Editor: hatter#6666

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Yaoyao is a healer with enough Dendro application for Quicken, Burgeon and Hyperbloom teams, as well as Nilou's Bountiful Cores team.
For Aggravate teams, (the last team given), the Electro unit may need a battery, and generally a second Electro/Dendro character is recommended in Quicken.
